price: 104 Allah ne saurait guider ceux qui ne croient pas en Ses versets qui, au contraire, sont voués à un douloureux châtiment.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَهۡدِيهِمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna biāyāti al-lahi lā yahdīhimu al-lahu walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
